Course-name: Business Fundamentals for Entrepreneurs (Part 1: Internal Operation)
content: Business Fundamentals for Entrepreneurs - Part 1: Internal Operation Starting a new business can be an exciting but daunting prospect for aspiring entrepreneurs. Modern companies are multi-disciplinary and complex entities especially as they scale up. Founders need appreciation and awareness of many different functional domains, as well as hard & soft skills.
